title: Spec Ops Rengar
body:
description: Rengar wears a ghillie suit and has three eyed night vision goggles (green lenses), he has a combat knife in one hand and his other stays the same (unless you have an idea for it i guess)

abilities:
Q: shouldn't need to explain this, but he stabs someone with his combat knife.
W: no ideas for this
e: if rengar has fury, he throws a flash-bang instead of his bola
R: rengar cloaks turning invisible, his eyes glow while he has full fury or is cloaked.

other: 
recall: rengar holds up his hand openly, a chopper noise fades in quickly before he grabs onto a rope and flies off


voicing:
recall: "mission successful." / "requesting Evac"
upon cloaking via ult: "target acquired"
taunt: I only need one eye to defeat you!
Joke: same

rengar would be voicing everything through a radio. 

i thought splash art could have him hiding in some background vegetation and watching another champion with a theme, something like insurgent caitlyn, with a beret, tank top, gorilla camo short shorts, and hiking boots.

leave feedback please

replies.body: Why not have one of those one-eye eyepieces. They would look badass on him, since one of his eyes are different after all.
